author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> RollCall tomorrow at 15:00 UTC, I've pushed it back an hour due to conflicts with the Dencun fork timing. Also note that due to daylight savings time changes, if you're in the USA it may be 2 hours later than previous editions.

Agenda:   https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/960
Time:       *15:00 UTC*
Link:         will be posted here ~15 mins before the call

author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> I've had a number of people reach out about not being able to make the call as a result of the L1 fork, or shipping forks for L2. Additionally, the main topics for discussion are non-urgent, but are high priority for L2 feedback.

As such, I've decided to cancel tomorrow's call and we can pick up in April when everyone is able to dedicate the time.

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> See you on the Dencun livestream https://www.youtube.com/live/iL0cZRkyrV0?feature=share (https://www.youtube.com/live/iL0cZRkyrV0?feature=share) .oO!
